ComicInfo.Summary:
A disgruntled father, whose daughter has been missing for a while now, has traced a connection to several disappearances back to Sister Fabula.
Heâ€™s taking matters into his own hands now, can Sister Fabula talk her way out of this one? The tale she spins follows that of another father, one who lives on a farm in Arizona. However, little does he know, his family is about to be visited by a legend who walks the rivers at night- howling for her lost children.
Sister Fabula watches over the Holy Rose Cemetery, and spins tales of terror with each guest she interacts with. Sometimes her guests end up in a tale of their own.
